content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vendor_unquoted.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS vendor;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vendor_escaped.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        ESCAPE_CHAR = '\\'
    ) AS vendor;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vendor.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDQUOTE = '"'
    ) AS vendor;


( 
        vendor_id TINYINT,
        vendor_name VARCHAR(50)
    )
